name: Wild Animal Zoo Simulator Pro
description:
The most beautiful and realistic animal Simulator available on the IOS!
This app for iPhone and iPad offers many and varied animal sounds and action .
This game is adapted to the diversion and learning of the kids!
This is the perfect app to have a good time with your children or simply to laugh a little with your friends!
With this educational application for little kids, teach your baby or toddler to recognize animals and sounds they make.
They will discover new animals and will have fun during the game!

Features of this Safari Animal Simulator Game:

- Funny wild animals!
- African Safari!
- Endless survival game!
- Suitable for children!
- Free Animal Simulator Game!

If you like the mix of animals, simulators then make sure to download this game!
